articles.title: Fed likely to cut rates before ECB blinks, former BOE member says - CNBC
articles.description: The Federal Reserve is likely to cut rates before the European Central Bank does, a former member of the Bank of England said.
articles.content:
The U.S. Federal Reserve is likely to cut interest rates before the European Central Bank does, a former member of the Bank of England said, defying current market expectations.

articles.title: Europe launches subsidies probe into Chinese wind turbine suppliers - CNN
articles.description: The European Union has launched an investigation into China’s state support for its wind turbine companies, intensifying a push to protect Europe’s industry from a flood of cheap Chinese imports.
